text: Myanmars military junta has remitted the sentences of more than 23,000 prisoners, announcements in state media from Senior General Min Aung Hlaing said on Friday, a public holiday.As announcement said sentences for Myanmar prisoners were being remitted while the country is establishing a new democractic state with peace, development and discipline to turn the prisoners into certain decent citizens, to please the public and to create the humanitarian and compassionate grounds.The sentences of 23,314 Myanmar prisoners and 55 foreign prisoners were remitted, the announcements said.
